nodes.text: Ren Voilis was a man who lived during the waning years of the Galactic Republic.

Voilis worked for Cularin Central Broadcasting and was the producer for a number of its shows. He also produced the show Eye on Cularin, in which Yara Grugara featured. Grugara used the show to establish a career for herself as a reporter and during the Clone Wars, an unofficial documentary was released, that was highly critical of her. The documentary included footage of Grugara kissing Voilis one week prior to the signing of her contract of CCB and it hinted that she had only got the job because she had had a relationship with him.
